name: A Double Portrait of Hans Furraht and Jacob von der Burch
maker: Attributed to Ludger Tom Ring the Younger
description: A Double Portrait of Hans Furraht and Jacob von der Burch; Attributed to Ludger Tom Ring the Younger (German, 1522 - 1584); Germany; about 1560; Pen and black ink and gray wash, heightened with white gouache on blue-gray prepared paper; 14.3 x 20.8 cm (5 5/8 x 8 3/16 in.); 95.GA.36; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: A Double Portrait of Hans Furraht and Jacob von der Burch
medium: Pen and black ink and gray wash, heightened with white gouache on blue-gray prepared paper
